sentence.Network_cn: 这次开车好像没有尽头。

sentence.Network_en: For several seemingly interminable seconds no one spoke.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几秒钟没有人讲话,这几秒钟似乎十分漫长.

sentence.Network_en: I was glad of company for the last, long hours of this interminable flight.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这次漫无尽头的飞行的最后几个小时里,我有人作伴很高兴.

list.abs: the audience was bored by the president's interminable speech .主席那冗长的讲话令听众们厌烦。
during this interminable year , he added , all of France was in Verdun .他补充道，在这个漫长的年代，整个法兰西都在凡尔登。
At the end of the queue waits an interminable lift journey ., 排队等候结束后是漫长的电梯之旅.
their quarrels about the trivia are always interminable ., 他们对琐事的争吵总是没完没了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from late Latin interminabilis, from in- 'not' + terminare (see terminate)

entry.tran: 无休止的;没完没了的;冗长不堪的
entry.def: If you describe something as interminable, you are emphasizing that it continues for a very long time and indicating that you wish it was shorter or would stop.

auth_sentence.content: But The End Matter remains an interminable twilight struggle.
auth_sentence.res_content: But The End Matter remains an interminable twilight struggle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But The End Matter remains an interminable twilight struggle.

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结

means.word_mean: 持续得过长的(通常指使人恼怒或厌烦)
